products.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Porcelain White Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Porcelain White Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Palate Lace White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palate Lace White
products.productdescription: The Palate Lace White is one of the whitest fabrics in our blackout roller blind range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a Blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Day & Night Flecked White
products.metadescription: Day & Night Flecked White
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.productdescription: The Faro White Vertical Blind featuring its modern pattern with textured streaks, the slight contrast in texture makes this blind an aesthetically pleasing choice. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Amor White Lotus Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor White Lotus Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Add some serenity to your home with the pure tones of the Amor White Lotus vertical blind. One of our best-selling roller blinds, the clean hue has a contemporary feel that pairs well with simplistic interiors. The blackout material blind is fully impenetrable to light, perfect for comprehensive shading bedrooms and overexposed areas of your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Gibson Perfect White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The Gibson Perfect White is a beautiful blind that gives a bright and airy feel even when closed. A solid colour fabric, it works brilliantly in smaller rooms as the pale colouration visually extends the space. Designed to suit damp conditions, the bli
products.productdescription: The Gibson Perfect White is a beautiful blind that gives a bright and airy feel even when closed. A solid colour fabric, it works brilliantly in smaller rooms as the pale colouration visually extends the space. Designed to suit damp conditions, the blind's hardwearing fabric is wipe-clean and fire retardant, so it can work in tricky spaces such as bathrooms and kitchens. Choose to have controls on either the left or right according to what best suits your layout. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Gibson White Dove Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The Gibson White Dove is a light beige coloured roller blind, use this with brighter colourful decors. Don't pair it with magnolia - otherwise, you might night know where the walls start and the blind ends. This blind is however, brilliant for a bathro
products.productdescription: The Gibson White Dove is a light beige coloured roller blind, use this with brighter colourful decors. Don't pair it with magnolia - otherwise, you might night know where the walls start and the blind ends. This blind is however, brilliant for a bathroom. The fabric is 100% waterproof, making it ideal for placing in a hot, steamy bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in. The sheer fabric is thin and delicate and will give your room privacy from anyone looking in.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. products.title: Infusion asc White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4101. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Velvet Canvas Cream Curtain
products.metadescription: Velvet Canvas Cream Curtain in Cream. Made to measure from £24.42 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s.
 This soft curtain in Canvas Cream, adds a warm neutral hue to your home. A light cream shade creates feeling of calm and warmth, this velvet cream curtain creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this curtain made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our curtains are made to last. Our curtains come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service!

products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Snow White Blackout Honeycomb Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Snow White Blackout Honeycomb Perfect Fit
products.productdescription:
The gorgeous pleated Snow White Honeycomb Blackout Perfect Fit blind is a simple yet elegant choice. Its pure white fabric offers versatile style options. It will add a modern, classy feel to any window you choose. You simply can’t go wrong with a crisp white blind.
 Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more.

products.title: Bella Blackout Paper White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Paper White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This Paper White panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This off-white panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0281 Fabric Colour: Paper White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Drill-Free Slimline Frame with Sleek Roller Casing     Control Type: Cordless Spring Operated Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Frost White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics are simplistic, value for money and come in a wide array of choices.  Bella Blackout Frost White is perfect for large windows or spaces, as they reach up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.  
 
 
Our panel blinds are cut to your sizes by our expert panel blind team.  At Swift Direct Blinds we are so confident of the quality of our products, we provide a FREE five year guarantee. 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0225 Fabric Colour: Frost Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Eco Friendly FR White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Eco Friendly FR White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Eco-Friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste.  This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! 
 
Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.  White doesnt have to mean stark. This white panel  blind creates a fresh and smart finish, meaning you have a perfect base to accessorise the room as muh as you want! Panel blinds are fantastic as room dividers or for large panes of glass due to their large size, up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made panel blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind!
